(Firing at the pelvis has its own unique strategy, and sorry about the Doom 
Ice mix up, I put it down the first time as Doom Ice, then when I looked back 
at it to make sure, I thought it was Ice Doom...crazy me.  Oh, and if anyone 
is wondering, I'm leaving Nemesis Enforcer and Scattershot out for now 
because I'm waiting for Alloran to reply)

Serpentor/Punch/Unitron/Sixshot/Ares/Chaos/Minion/Demon Wulf/Flesh 
Ripper/Dark Claw/The Oblitercons:



Unitron's right side seared with pain from Stronghold's missile, and 
Unitron's mind was racing with evil thoughts of vengance.  Swerving the 
cannon to face Stronghold (Uni is currently a tank), he fired off a blast of 
energy.

---

Serpentor catches the lightning blast in his back, sending him sprawling 
backwards.

-------

Punch continues having the autoguns firing upon the Mafia.

-------

Demon Wulf, taking a step forward, is hit in the chest mid-step, falling back 
a few feet.  Re-establishing a good stance, Demon Wulf fired off three optic 
blasts at Gigas' abdomen.  

---

Dark Claw raised a hand, Shockaract's blasts striking him the side, Dark Claw 
getting down to one knee for support, firing off a blue blast of energy from 
his left palm at Shockaract.

---

Flesh Ripper lets the blasts knocking him back a few feet, taking quick aim, 
seeing the small skirmish between Serge and Burning Hammer, and Serge ending 
up on both knees.  "Ha." Flesh Ripper said without emotion, firing off four 
blasts from his rifle at Serge's chest.

---

Chaos transformed to robot mode.  "I've got to save my missiles for when they 
are really needed." he said quickly, an automatic rifle appearing in his 
hands.  He fired off 20 shells at the downed Rizopas.

---

Minion yells out as he jumps backwards, the explosion sending him flipping, 
slamming to the ground hard, Minion slowly got up, looking around to try and 
clear his thoughts.

---

Dark One pulled up, loading two more missiles, getting ready to make a second 
pass.

---

Pyro took aim with his cannon (he's also currently a tank), firing off three 
more fireballs at Diskus' torso.

---

Hiss, the only Oblitercon not in his alternate mode, fell to his back from 
Shockaract's return fire.  On his back, Hiss returned fire with a single 
fusion blast at Shockaract.

---

Breakdown (now a cannon/artillery), fired off a mortar shell at Doom Ice.

---

Scavenger transforms to his HUMVEE (I've become uncertain about the spelling 
recently) mode, not wanting to play the speed game.  Going into reverse, the 
two machine guns, one mounted on both sides, fired twenty rounds off each, a 
twenty of forty rounds heading straight for Blender's legs, Scavenger going 
into reverse.

---

Sixshot sees Gigas fall down, and the STAG transforms into his wolf-creature 
mode (wolf with wings), and dives, his four inch claws outstretched and 
pointed at Gigas' back.  "Have fun in the great junkyard in the sky!"

---

Ares yells out in anger.  "STUPID IDIOT!  YOU WERE SUPPOSED TO DIE!" he 
screams as anger that had been built up since Unitron crippled the Newcomers 
was let out, Ares driving in his tank mode straight for Grenade.

Targeting with his weapons, he fired off a total of nine laser blasts (three 
from three cannons) at Grenade.
